title: A rejection of “Trussonomics”
itunes:title: A rejection of “Trussonomics”
itunes:author: Marketplace / Kai Ryssdal
description: The United Kingdom’s economy was sent into a tailspin during Liz Truss’ six short weeks as prime minister. Today, we’ll check in with Marketplace’s London bureau chief to discuss the political and economic fallout of Truss’ resignation and hear what’s next for 10 Downing Street. We’ll also dissect the corporate strategies for price hikes, follow the money in midterm elections and weigh infrastructure improvement options for cash-strapped towns.
